about_the_game:
◆Story


It should be... 5842613...? Or... 5842615...？
“Hey, listen. It’s... almost time to wake up ...”
“Yoohoo...”
In my vague consciousness, I heard someone continuously shouting.
...
“Wake up!”
“It seems that you still have an unclear consciousness?”
“But there’s no time to waste, so get up and get ready!”
I made an all-out effort to open my eyes, but the blinding light forced me to close them again until my hands covered the light.
After gradually getting used to it, I found a girl with horns appeared in front of me.

“Where is it...? Make preparations for what...?”
I looked around carefully, and it was like an auditorium, but there was no one except that young girl.
I can’t remember how I got here and where I had been before. I can’t even remember my name. What’s all this about...?

“It’s definitely to protect the last demons!”
“You are the last hope of demons, so you’ll find the ways for us no matter how many times.”
I don’t understand what this guy is talking about... Why should I do such a thing?

◆Gameplay


You are a demon king with memory loss, training daily to improve your ability to resist adventurers’ invasions under the prompting of the mysterious goddess.
After thoroughly defeating each incoming adventurer, you’ll acquire unique skills to fight new invaders.
Develop a unique character for each turn in light of different training methods!

A distinctive system, an interesting Rougelike cultivating mode, a specific cultivating system, a game system with multiple re-playing chances, and an increasingly powerful character system as the game processes.
At the beginning of each new round, you can allocate your stepped-up protection based on the experience points gained from previous failures to develop a unique character.
In the game, you’ll conduct daily training. Additionally, you can establish a bond with the added demons or adventurers while strengthening your abilities.

As the training progresses, the castle will grow, and more demons will be recruited to join the demon king’s army!
All the actions and events in the game are designed to develop a unique demon king and experience different events, finally resisting the ... from God’s world!

In the battle, the player, as the demon king, must carefully choose fighting actions to defeat the powerful adventurers.
As the story progresses, the adventurers will also become stronger, using particular skills to fight with the player. So it’s a test for the reborn demon king to make a wise choice in each round.

◆Game Features


◇Unique cultivation training
◇Thrilling and exciting battles against invaders
◇Tricky strategic round-based battles
◇Exhilarating H events
◇Bonding storyline with numerous female characters and past stories waiting to be explored
◇Attractive main storyline

The game will contain:
Ten basic CGs. There are more than four expressions in each CG, totalling over 40 different sets of changes!
Live 2D of some CGs
Challenges with multiple re-playing chances
Training content to test your strategies
Dedicated stories with numerous female characters
Various defensive battles
